src:
Komplikuje se borba u Partizanovoj grupi, Ritas tukao Lokomotivu u Krasnodaru
Litvanski tim stigao do drugog trijumfa u Evrokupu

05 Nov 2019

Možda ne mogu da pobede nijednog drugog rivala u grupi, ali su za Lokomotivu Kubanj košarkaši Ritasa prave tata-mate. Litvanski klub zabeležio je i drugi trijumf u Evrokupu i to na gostovanju u Krasnodaru od 87:82 čime je zakomplikovao borbu za drugi krug u grupi B u kojoj Partizan suvereno dominira.
Sami su krivi domaćini što su izgubili već dobijenu utakmicu. Sredinom poslednje četvrtine vodili su sa čak sa osam poena razlike (75:67), ali gosti se nisu predavali. Preko Ehodasa i Kruza koji su ubacili pet poena vratili su se u meč, Lokomotiva je prestala da pogađa i igrala smušene napade, a malo pomalo Ritas se približio i stigao do vođstva sa linije slobodnih bacanja u 39. minutu (82:81) čime je trasiran put ka trijumfu. 
U napetoj završnici Kalnijetis, Kulagin (dva puta) i Kamings su promašivali šuteve, Lokomotiva je dozvolila i ofanzivni skok rivalu, a potom oklevala sa faulom koji je trebalo odmah da bude napravljen, pa je Ritas sa linije slobodnih bacanja osigurao pobedu.
Najefikasniji u redovima pobednika bio je Evaldas Kairis sa 16 poena (8/8 za dva) uz šest skokova, Bendžijus je postigao 12, Pako Kruz 11, a Butkevičus 10.
Na drugoj strani domaćine je predvodio Kulagin sa 18 poena, uz četiri skoka i šest asistencija, Sem Deker imao je 16 (uz dobrih 7/9 iz igre) i pet skokova, dok je nekadašnji prvotimac FMP-a Dragan Apić upisao 12 poena, pet skokova i asistenciju.
U sledećem kolu Lokomotiva Kubanj gostuje u Veneciji, dok Ritas na svom parketu dočekuje francuski Limož.

EVROKUP - 6. KOLO




GRUPA A




Utorak20.00: (1,70) Andora (14,5) Monako (2,30)


Sreda18.30: (1,07) Promiteas (25,0) Makabi Rišon (8,50)20.30: (1,17) Virtus (20,0) Ulm (5,50)







GRUPA B



UtorakLokomotiva Kubanj - Ritas 82:87/Kulagin 18 - Kairis 16/


20.00: (1,15) Partizan (15,0) Venecija (3,05)



Sreda20.00: (2,30) Limož (14,5) Tofaš (1,70)







GRUPA C




Sreda17.30: (1,30) Uniks (16,0) Breša (3,90)18.15: (1,30) Darušafaka (16,0) Cedevita Olimpija (3,90)20.45: (1,30) Huventud (16,0) Nanter (3,90)







GRUPA D




Utorak18.00: (1,35) Galatasaraj (16,0) Trento (3,50)20.00: (2,10) Arka (14,0) Oldenburg (1,85)


Sreda19.00: (2,55) Budućnost (14,5) Unikaha (1,60)






*** kvote su podložne promenama


Foto: Star Sport
text:
Complicating the fight in Partizan's group, Ritas beat Lokomotiv in Krasnodar
Lithuanian team reach second triumph in Eurocup

05 Nov 2019

They may not be able to beat any other rivals in the group, but for Lokomotiv Kubanj, the Ritas basketball players are real dad-mates. The Lithuanian club also recorded a second triumph in Eurocup in an away game in Krasnodar 87:82, complicating the fight for the second round in Group B in which Partizan sovereignly dominates.
The hosts themselves are to blame for losing the match already won. In the middle of the last quarter they led by as much as eight points difference (75:67), but the guests did not give up. Through Ehodas and Cruz, who scored five points, returned to the match, Lokomotiva stopped picking and playing offensive attacks, and little by little Ritas came close to taking the lead from the free throw line in the 39th minute (82:81). the path to triumph.
In the tense final Kalnijetis, Kulagin (twice) and Cummings missed shots, Lokomotiva also allowed an offensive rebound and then hesitated with a foul which should have been made immediately, so Ritas secured the win from the free throw line.
Evaldas Cairis with 16 points (8/8 for two) with six rebounds was the most efficient in the ranks, with Benjius scoring 12, Pako Cruz 11 and Butkevichus 10.
On the other side of the hosts was led by Kulagin with 18 points, with four rebounds and six assists, Sam Deker had 16 (with a good 7/9 from the game) and five rebounds, while former FMP champion Dragan Apic recorded 12 points, five jumps and assists.
In the next round Lokomotiv Kubanj is visiting Venice, while Ritas is greeted by French Limoges on his parquet floor.

EUROCUP - ROUND 6




GROUP A




Tuesday20.00: (1.70) Andorra (14.5) Monaco (2.30)


Wednesday18.30: (1.07) Promiteas (25.0) Maccabi Rishon (8.50) 20.30: (1.17) Virtus (20.0) Ulm (5.50)







GROUP B

Wednesday20.00: (2.30) Limoges (14.5) Tofash (1.70)

GROUP D
